data.title: Belgium
data.meta_description: Bringing the best ideas, people and technical expertise from our global business, we partner with clients to turn ambitions into action.
data.text:
How we are delivering a better world in Benelux

We’re leading the change toward a safer and more sustainable future within the sectors we serve, partnering with those who want to make a positive difference here in the Benelux region.

In our increasingly complex built environment, we combine the expertise of our global network of more than 40,000 professionals with in-depth local knowledge to help clients turn their ambitions into action. Our core services span project and construction management, architecture and engineering, health and safety support and auditing, due diligence, environmental impact assessments, and soil and groundwater investigation and remediation.

Landmark projects include supporting the Hague and Rotterdam to strengthen their climate resilience (part of the 100 Resilient Cities framework); delivering construction management services for an iconic high rise in the centre of Amsterdam; and advising a wide range of industrial clients on complex project cases related to PFAS.

We also have a strong reputation as environmental, social and governance (ESG) advisors, helping clients plan their transition to a lower-carbon future while also helping them to understand and mitigate against climate risk.

Safety is a core value for us. We operate ethically and with integrity, prioritising safety and security in all that we do. This has made us a trusted leader in the industry.

Recognised within AECOM as a centre of excellence for engineering, project management and advisory services related to energy transition, we’re using our expertise to deliver sustainable legacies across the region. From installing electric vehicle chargers at Shell retail stations to studying the environmental impacts of a subsea cable that will create the first direct power link between Germany and Great Britain, we are paving the way to a greener, more climate-resilient future.

Where is AECOM based in Benelux?

There are four offices in the region. One is in The Hague, Netherlands. We also have offices in Ghent and Leuven in Belgium as well as in Luxembourg.

We are a growing and ambitious team, committed to making a positive impact in Benelux. From small beginnings, we now have more than 160 employees across the region – a testament to our entrepreneurial spirit.

Why work for AECOM in Benelux?

Our collaborative, people-focused culture is embedded in the way we work here in Benelux. We value our Freedom to Grow initiative, which supports work flexibility among our employees.

By joining AECOM, you’ll get the chance to contribute your skills and ideas, collaborate with teams globally and support our shared mission to deliver a better world.
